trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Ironwood
There were no other sightings in Ironwood on or around July 4th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi was traveling east toward iron river, michigan when a friend and i saw a glowing red\orange ball of light in the sky. i looked up because fireworks were going off around the night sky, but this light stayed glowing for about 10 min. i thought it was another firework, but it looked like it was moving a bit and the light was consistent. it flickered a little bit before it disappeared. i though after seeing this that there was nothing i know of it could be, so thus a ufos. the light just disappeared above the horizon.
